name: Quickorder
headline: Allow B2B users to add multiple products to the cart at once.
overview: The Quickorder app is tailor-made to B2B needs: it creates a custom page in your store aimed at purchases in bulk, offering tools such as uploading a spreadsheet to make bulk orders more simple.
features: Copy and paste SKUs in the Quick Order page
Upload a spreadsheet with SKU information
Search for SKUs in the Custom Search Bar
Add products according to their category
